q: Which number is different from the others? 43, 53, 63, 73, 83
desc: All except 63 are prime numbers; 63 is not a prime number.

desc: All except 21 are even numbers; 21 is odd.

desc: All except 51 are perfect squares; 51 is not a perfect square.

desc: All except 28 are divisible by 3; 28 is not divisible by 3.

desc: The sum of the digits of 324 is different (9) while for the others it is 10.

desc: 7 is the only prime number; the others are composite.

desc: All except 109 are divisible by 9; 109 is not.

desc: All except 50 are divisible by 7; 50 is not.

desc: In all except 264, the middle digit is the sum of the other two digits.

desc: In all except 4298, the last digit is two times the first digit.

desc: In all except 242, no digit is repeated.

desc: In all except 8218, the last digit is one more than the first digit.

desc: Each of the numbers except 5846 is an odd number.

desc: 11 is the only prime number; others are composite.

desc: In all except 2, the product of the digits is a perfect square.

desc: In all except 7324, the sum of the digits is 17.

q: Which number is different from the others? 119, 136, 147, 153
desc: 119 is the only number with two unique prime factors (7 and 17), others repeat a factor.

q: Which number is different from the others? 7, 15, 31, 57
desc: All except 57 can be written as 2^n-1 for some n.
